## Screenshots / Videos

## Checklist

- [ ] `npm ci` completes
- [ ] Type check passes: `npm run type-check`
- [ ] Lint passes: `npm run lint`
- [ ] Unit tests pass: `npm test`
- [ ] Coverage generated: `npm run test:coverage`
- [ ] Build succeeds: `npm run build`
- [ ] Docs updated (README/CONTRIBUTING/.env.example) if needed
- [ ] No sensitive env values committed

Note any breaking changes and migration steps.

## Security / Performance Considerations

Note if any changes affect security or performance.

## Testing Instructions

Provide steps for reviewers to test locally.
